    • RestockInventoryItem

      public RestockInventoryItem(int ingredient_id, String ingredient_name, int quantity, double price, String unit, double total_price)
      Constructs a RestockInventoryItem with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      ingredient_id - the unique ID of the ingredient
      ingredient_name - the name of the ingredient
      quantity - the quantity of the ingredient in the order
      price - the price of the ingredient
      unit - the unit of the ingredient
      total_price - the total price of the ingredient in the order
